Upholstered Booths Contour Booths Waiting Bench
Sub-Categories
Countour Booths Add a smooth, curved style to your lounge, diner or food court with a sturdy seating option from our creative collection of commercial quality restaurant booths. We offer an assortment of curved compartment seating that is durable and made to last. For interior design purposes each model offers multiple textured designer fabric and vinyl to enhance and match the theme of your specific decor. From vintage retro to modern contemporary we have style choices that will make the difference in your establishment.

We cordially invite you to browse our vast and distinct collection of quality, affordable and stylish restaurant furnishings to creatively outfit your commercial space with quality and taste. Our furniture section is full of great ideas for any business looking for multiple themes and styles. Choose from modern contemporary to European and Antique styles. Leather and vinyl choices as well as wood finishes. Give us a call today and let our experts help you achieve the exact look and feel for your business. All commercial furniture is made of the highest quality materials that offer long lasting comfort for your patrons. Feel free to call us when furnishing your business with your floor plan ideas and one of our furniture experts will be happy to assist you
